flawed_nl_solution:
Carl starts with 12 marbles to play with but loses 1/2, 12 / 2 = <<12/2=6>>6 marbles Carl didn't lose.
Carl takes out 10 more marbles, 6 + 10 = <<6+10=17>>17 marbles.
Then Carl's mother brings him 25 new marbles to add to the 17 he has out of his jar, 25 + 17 = <<25+17=42>>42 marbles that Carl is going to put in his jar after he plays his marbles game.
#### 42

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
